channel.title: [Class suggestion] Fool King
channel.description:
Hello everyone! Getting elected as Fool is very underwhelming IMHO so I thought I would suggest something funner than Neutral King.
> # [color=gray]The Fool King[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Special[/color]** > > **Trollbox (Passive)** - You may trollbox players an infinite number of times per day. The option to trollbox someone normally or trollbox a whisper is provided by right-clicking their name (along with the usual option to whisper them). > > **Royal Finger (Day)** - Your next accusation of treason will count twice. (Infinite uses) > **Magic Trick (Day)** - Pardon or execute the accused, ignoring all votes. If you chose to execute, you choose the class they reveal as. (1 use) > > **Guards! (Night)** - Make someone death immune for the night. (3 uses) > > **Goal:** Survive.

item.description:
Memesky is right, and I think “die at night” wincon makes more sense on a different class, I’m just going to revert and edit the OP

item.title: [Class suggestion] Fool King
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Hello everyone! Getting elected as Fool is very underwhelming IMHO so I thought I would suggest something funner than Neutral King.

The Fool King

Neutral Special

Trollbox (Passive) - You may trollbox players an infinite number of times per day. The option to trollbox someone normally or trollbox a whisper is provided by right-clicking their name (along with the usual option to whisper them).

Royal Finger (Day) - Your next accusation of treason will count twice. (Infinite uses)
Magic Trick (Day) - Pardon or execute the accused, ignoring all votes. If you chose to execute, you choose the class they reveal as. (1 use)

Guards! (Night) - Make someone death immune for the night. (3 uses)

Goal: Survive.

Read full topic
